plot outline: This socially relevant family drama delves into the struggle in the life of a brilliant young woman, who is forced to give up on all her professional dreams after marriage. When her successful husband wants her to stay in the kitchen and keep producing more babies in the hopes of getting a precious male heir, life really begins to drag her down. Will she continue to be a submissive housewife and wife or will she fights for her right to lead a fulfilling life?
title: Collector Gari Bharya
plot: This socially relevant family drama delves into the struggle in the life of a brilliant young woman, who is forced to give up on all her professional dreams after marriage. When her successful husband wants her to stay in the kitchen and keep producing more babies in the hopes of getting a precious male heir, life really begins to drag her down. Will she continue to be a submissive housewife and wife or will she fights for her right to lead a fulfilling life?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
